mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VST_BBS ( BBS_NM, FILE_ATCH_SIZE, FILE_ATCH_CO, USE_AT, PERM_EXTSN, FRST_REGISTER_ID, FRST_REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( #{bbsNm}, #{fileAtchSize}, #{fileAtchCo}, 'Y', #{permExtsn}, #{frstRegisterId}, NOW() )
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VST_BBS WHERE 1 = 1
AND(DATE_FORMAT(FRST_REGIST_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{minDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(FRST_REGIST_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{maxDate})
AND (BBS_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword} , '%') OR BBS_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword} , '%'))
ORDER BY FRST_REGIST_DT DESC
SELECT A.BBS_ID, A.BBS_NM, A.FILE_ATCH_SIZE, A.FILE_ATCH_CO, A.USE_AT, REPLACE(PERM_EXTSN, ' ', '') PERM_EXTSN FROM VST_BBS A WHERE A.BBS_ID = #{bbsId}
SELECT BBS_ID, BBS_NM, FILE_ATCH_SIZE, FILE_ATCH_CO, REPLACE(PERM_EXTSN, ' ', '') PERM_EXTSN FROM VST_BBS WHERE USE_AT = 'Y'
